titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 15-year recovery period for nonresidential real property in rural areas.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 15-year recovery period for nonresidential real property in rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for accelerated depreciation (i.e., 15-year recovery period) for nonresidential real property placed in service in a rural area.
